mapper.select: SELECT u.id Id, u.school_name schoolName, u.unit_name unitName, u.school_eng schoolEng, u.unit_eng unitEng, u.college_url collegeUrl, u.logo_url logoUrl, u.state state, u.domain_name domainName, u.background_url backgroundUrl FROM school_unit u WHERE u.id = #{unitId}

SELECT u.id Id, u.school_name schoolName, u.unit_name unitName, u.school_eng schoolEng, u.unit_eng unitEng, u.college_url collegeUrl, u.logo_url logoUrl, u.state state, u.background_url backgroundUrl, u.domain_name domainName, t.unit_id unitId FROM school_unit u, (SELECT unit_id,domain_name FROM unit_profile WHERE domain_name = #{domainName} ) t WHERE u.id = t.unit_id

SELECT u.school_name schoolName, u.unit_name unitName, u.school_eng schoolEng, u.unit_eng unitEng, u.college_url collegeUrl, u.logo_url logoUrl, u.state state, u.background_url backgroundUrl, u.domain_name domainName FROM school_unit u WHERE u.id = (SELECT t.unit_id FROM teacher_profile t WHERE t.id = #{id})
SELECT u.username userName, u.nickname nickName, u.email email FROM unit_profile u WHERE u.unit_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update school_unit SET college_url = #{collegeUrl}, school_eng=#{schoolEng}, unit_eng=#{unitEng}, logo_url = #{logoUrl}, state = #{state}, background_url = #{backgroundUrl} WHERE id = #{unitId}
